title: Full IB Student
description: Started exploring software development and coding during my time as a Full IB student, developing a passion for technology.
details: During this period, I experimented with various programming languages and tools, which laid the foundation for my future career in software development.

title: University of Alberta - CS Honours
description: Pursued a Computer Science Honours degree at the University of Alberta, gaining in-depth knowledge and experience in software development.
details: I specialized in several areas including algorithms, data structures, and software engineering, participating in various projects and internships.

title: Freelance and Small Organizations
description: Worked on various projects for small organizations, applying my skills to solve real-world problems and continue growing as a developer.
details: My work involved developing web applications, optimizing systems, and collaborating with teams to deliver high-quality solutions.
